name: 微積分甲（一）
description: 本課程目標是在銜接高中數學，並做為其他高等數學課程的基礎。內容主要介紹函數的極限概念、連續性、微分與積分方法、以及在數學與相關學科上的應用。課程的呈現為理論與方法並重，在假設實數系之基本性質的基礎之上，建立一個完整的體系。
goals: 進數學分析基本概念的理解
增進邏輯推理與歸納的能力
增進數學思維與批判性思考的能力
增進專業知識及追求真理的態度
syllabus:
Week 1  (9/5(一) ～ 9/11(日))

*   1.4 Exponential Functions
*   1.5 Inverse Functions and Logarithms
*   2.1 The Tangent and Velocity Problems
*   2.2 The Limit of a Function

Week 2  (9/12(一) ～ 9/18(日))

*   2.3 Calculating Limits Using the Limit Laws
*   2.4 The Precise Definition of a Limit
*   2.5 Continuity
*   2.6 Limits at Infinity; Horizontal Asymptotes

Week 3  (9/19(一) ～ 9/25(日))

*   2.7 Derivatives and Rates of Change
*   2.8 The Derivative as a Function
*   3.1 Derivatives of Polynomials and Exponential Functions
*   3.2 The Product and Quotient Rules

Week 4  (9/26(一) ～ 10/2(日))

*   3.3 Derivatives of Trigonometric Functions
*   3.4 The Chain Rule
*   3.5 Implicit Differentiation

Week 5  (10/3(一) ～ 10/9(日))

*   3.6 Derivatives of Logarithmic and Inverse Trigonometric Functions
*   3.10 Linear Approximations and Differentials
*   3.11\* Hyperbolic Functions
*   4.1 Maximum and Minimum Values

Week 6  (10/10(一) ～ 10/16(日))

*   4.2 The Mean Value Theorem
*   4.3 What Derivatives Tell Us about the Shape of a Graph
*   **四****)** **第一次期中考**)

Week 7  (10/17(一) ～ 10/23(日))

*   4.4 Indeterminate Forms and l'Hospital's Rule
*   4.5 Summary of Curve Sketching
*   4.7 Optimization Problems
*   4.8\* Newton's Method

Week 8  (10/24(日) ～ 10/30(日))

*   4.9 Antiderivatives
*   5.1 The Area and Distance Problems
*   5.2 The Definite Integral
*   5.3 The Fundamental Theorem of Calculus

Week 9  (10/31(一) ～ 11/6(日))

*   5.4 Indefinite Integrals and the Net Change Theorem
*   5.5 The Substitution Rule
*   6.1 Areas Between Curves
*   6.2 Volumes

Week 10  (11/7(一) ～ 11/13(日))

*   6.3 Volumes by Cylindrical Shells
*   6.5 Average Value of a Function
*   7.1 Integration by Parts

Week 11  (11/14(一) ～ 11/20(日))

*   7.2 Trigonometric Integrals
*   7.3 Trigonometric Substitution
*   **四****)** **第二次期中考**)

Week 12  (11/21(一) ～ 11/27(日))

*   7.4 Integration of Rational Functions by Partial Fractions
*   7.5 Strategy for Integration
*   7.7 Approximate Integration

Week 13  (11/28(一) ～ 12/4(日))

*   7.8 Improper Integrals
*   8.1 Arc Length
*   8.2 Area of a Surface of Revolution

Week 14  (12/5(一) ～ 12/11(日))

*   11.1 Sequences
*   11.2 Series
*   11.3 The Integral Test and Estimates of Sums

Week 15  (12/12(一) ～ 12/18(日))

*   11.4 The Comparison Tests
*   11.5 Alternating Series and Absolute Convergence

Week 16  (12/19(一) ～ 12/25(日))

*   11.6 The Ratio and Root Tests
*   11.7\* Strategy for Testing Series

(**12/22 (****四****)** **期末考**)

Weeks 17～18  Study the supplementary sections with \*.
